definition: to toil/labor/laborer/to put sb to trouble (of doing sth)/meritorious deed/to console (Taiwan pr. [lao4] for this sense)
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb

sentences.english: Where persons receiving treatment of drug addiction are organized to engage in production or other work, remunerations shall be paid to them.
sentences.chinese: 組織戒毒人員參加生產勞動的，應當支付勞動報酬。

sentences.english: But they've, you're saying, but they've all been paid for their services.
sentences.chinese: 但是你也說了，他們已經得到了自己的勞動報酬。
